bug.short_desc: ESEARCH results from UID SEARCH do not contain the "UID" modifier when no results are returned

long_desc.thetext:
Thanks for the report. This appears to have been fixed already, in:
https://cgit.cyrus.foundation/cyrus-imapd/commit/?id=d662ae0 (master) https://cgit.cyrus.foundation/cyrus-imapd/commit/?id=bd21af9 (cyrus-imapd-2.5)
which will be included in future releases.
